entry.value: DEqMS tool, developed on the top of LIMMA test, performs statistical analysis of differential protein expression on labe-free MS data. %%00010%%00010For further information please refer to publication: Zhu Y (2019). DEqMS: a tool to perform statistical analysis of differential protein expression for quantitative proteomics data.. R package version 1.4.0. %%00010%%00010Please note, that filtering on the number of NA values per condition is done within the node, therefore user is provided by fewer number of protein rows than in the input!%%00010%%00010To append the processed columns to original dataframe use please join on protein IDs or gene names.%%00010=========================%%00010Node settings:%%00010- test name: by default DEqMS, can be specified by user%%00010%%00010- Protein intensities columns: select the columns containing protein intensities or LFQ intensities. PLEASE PROVIDE NON-LOG2 TRANSFORMED INTENSITIES!%%00010%%00010- Razor and unique peptide counts columns: select the columns containing razor and unique peptide counts (same conditions as in intensities columns)%%00010%%00010- design: provide the design to corresponding columns selected in preceding steps. E.g. "conditionA,conditionA,conditionA,conditionB,conditionB,conditionB"%%00010%%00010- contrasts: provide contrasts for testing, e.g. conditionB-conditionA%%00010%%00010=========================%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms.%%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3.6 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3.6/license.html)%%00010R (The R consists of the following GNU General Public Licences. Licence terms are available here: https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/)%%00010R package DEqMS%%00010R package matrixStats%%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.1.1 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.1.1a.%%00010%%00010=================%%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html.%%00010Version: 1.0.0 from 2020-04-02%%00010Contact person: Kristina Gomoryova (423436@mail.muni.cz)%%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes.
